title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8157.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8157.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 54. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 54 between the Steuben county line
and 54A in the Village of Penn Yan and Towns of Barrington and Milo. (b) Route 54A. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 54A between Route 54 and the Penn Yan Express terminal in the

Village of Penn Yan, and the Town of Jerusalem. (c) Route 14A. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 14A between the Schuyler county line and the Ontario county
line in the Villages of Dundee and Penn Yan and the Towns of Starkey, Barrington, Milo and Benton. (d) Route 14. Route 14 between the Yates-Schuyler county line and the Yates-Ontario
county line in the Village of Dresden and the Towns of Starkey, Milo, Torrey
and Benton. (e) Route 245. Route
245 between the northerly Ontario-Yates county line and the westerly

Ontario-Yates county line in the Village of Rushville and the Towns of

Middlesex and Italy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8157.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
